text:
When using XML syntax for writing JSP pages XML comments <!-- Like this one -->
are not removed from the output.  This did not seem to occur in earlier versions
of Tomcat 4.
creator: jorge.williams@inl.gov
markt@apache.org
text: This is consistent with the spec. See JSP.2.5.1

I'm sorry but if I'm reading JSP.2.5.1 correctly then the comment should apear 
in the response output stream as is.  But unfortunately this does not happen, 
instead the "<!--"  and "-->"  gets removed from the response output stream and 
the comments appear as text in the generated output which I beleive is wrong.  
Note, this only happens when using XML syntax.
creator: jorge.williams@inl.gov
markt@apache.org
text: OK, that sounds like a problem. I'll take a look.

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
My bad. When I fixed bug 22802 I wasn't careful enough with the copy and paste
and introduced this problem.

The fix is now in svn and will be included in the next release.

Thanks for the report.
